summary: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

keywords: bedknob|alternate history|good versus evil|reference to henri de toulouse lautrec|lost island
title: La bruja novata
